sentence.Network_en: The ancient province of Satsuma lies in the southernmost part of the Japanese island of Kyushu.
sentence.Network_cn: 古老的萨摩省位于日本九州岛最南端。

sentence.Network_en: A small cloud smoke rises from a volcano on Kyushu, Japan.
sentence.Network_cn: 一小缕云烟从日本九州的一座火山上空升起.

sentence.Network_en: Recently, another Kyushu resident was hailed as the world's oldest man.
sentence.Network_cn: 最近, 一位名叫友吉中元寺的九州岛老人被列为世界上最长寿的男人.
